ACHIEVEMENT-66e1ddfdcce7d0d2ca626bd5-TAS: Find a way to pass through the first chapel
Find a way to enter the third chapel
Fool the guard in the Temple Garden that you're a messenger

ACHIEVEMENT-66e2e5a2cce7d0d2ca62c960-DES: Equip the bow. Attack enemies from a distance. Must be done in a single playthrough.
ACHIEVEMENT-66e35951cce7d0d2ca62f607-DES: Bring 10 Tusk Medallions to Hadrian Trout. You must deliver all of them in a single playthrough in order to complete this achievement.
ACHIEVEMENT-66e99e23cce7d0d2ca639189-DES: The dead stay dead. They have no need for material things.

ACHIEVEMENT-66e99ef1cce7d0d2ca6391a3-DES: The world is a wicked place. Killing people is easy. Keeping them alive is easier said than done.

Make peace between the soldiers and the druids
Bring the renegade druids to safety on Graefir Island

Free the lord of Highcastle from captivity
